name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

name: Renegade Tactics
oracle_text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Nothing against you. It's just that waiting for Consulate clearance was never really my thing."

name: Ripscale Predator
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: As Ravnica's wilds expanded, even advocates for nature had to confront fiercer natural threats.

name: Rummaging Goblin
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: To a goblin, value is based on the four S's: shiny, stabby, smelly, and super smelly.

name: Run Away Together
oracle_text: Choose two target creatures controlled by different players. Return those creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor_text:
"Virtue is virtue, whatever the heart that nurtures it."
—Malacan, Vantress exile

name: Rupture Spire
oracle_text:
Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Sailor of Means
oracle_text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.

name: Sanitarium Skeleton
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: His mind was lost long before his flesh.

name: Scholar of Stars
oracle_text: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.
flavor_text: "The path of the stars is as reliable as the instruments that measure them."

name: Scrapdiver Serpent
oracle_text: Scrapdiver Serpent can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.
flavor_text: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.

name: Scrounging Bandar
oracle_text:
Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.
flavor_text: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

name: Search for Tomorrow
oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Seer's Lantern
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: A light to bring hope in dark times.

name: Sentinel Spider
oracle_text: Vigilance, reach
flavor_text:
"Your first reaction may be to stand very still and hope she didn't see you. Trust me, she did."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist

name: Seraph of Dawn
oracle_text: Flying, lifelink
flavor_text: She parts the clouds so sunlight can reach even the darkest lairs and duskiest tombs.

name: Silverback Shaman
oracle_text:
Trample
When Silverback Shaman dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: The apes of Yavimaya draw strength from the spirits of their ancestors.

name: Simic Guildgate
oracle_text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text:
"Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation."
—Vannifar

name: Simic Signet
flavor_text: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

name: Sisay's Ring
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text:
"With this ring, you have friends in worlds you've never heard of."
—Sisay, Captain of the *Weatherlight*

name: Skaab Goliath
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two creature cards from your graveyard.
Trample
flavor_text: Three heads are better than one.

name: Sky Diamond
oracle_text:
Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
flavor_text: The essence of wind to lift up the weary.

name: Skyraker Giant
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: She will not be content until hers is the highest head in the sky.

name: Skywhaler's Shot
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or greater. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: In the moment of truth, it is as though time stands still, and the whale waits, suspended in the sky.

name: Slith Ascendant
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: Instinctively drawn to the light of its "mother-sun," each slith follows that sun's path around Mirrodin.

name: Soul's Fire
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target.
flavor_text: An avatar he sculpts of anger and flame.

name: Soul's Might
oracle_text: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's power.
flavor_text: An avatar he sculpts of instinct and force.

name: Spark Harvest
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

name: Sparktongue Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

name: Spectral Searchlight
oracle_text: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color they choose.
flavor_text: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.

name: Spontaneous Mutation
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: When the body turns, the mind soon follows.

name: Sporemound
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Squad Captain
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Squad Captain enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control.
flavor_text: The strength of the one is the strength of the many.

name: Staunch Throneguard
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Staunch Throneguard enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text:
"Brago in his arrogance let the throne's defenses fall dormant. Our new queen is not so incautious."
—Livio, Oathsworn Sentinel

name: Stonefury
oracle_text: Stonefury deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor_text: Akoum can make any intruder look small.

name: Strategic Planning
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Bolas remade this place in his image. He has the advantage here. We must approach carefully."
—Jace Beleren

name: Supernatural Stamina
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor_text:
"All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

name: Temur Battle Rage
oracle_text:
Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
Ferocious — That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

name: Thorn of the Black Rose
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Thorn of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text: If bribery and intimidation fail, Marchesa turns to her favorite form of persuasion.

name: Thornwood Falls
oracle_text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

name: Transguild Promenade
oracle_text:
Transguild Promenade enters the battlefield tapped.
When Transguild Promenade enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Trove Tracker
oracle_text:
When Trove Tracker dies, draw a card.
Encore {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The best treasures are the least shared.

name: Trusty Packbeast
oracle_text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."
—Hewen Frit, merchant

name: Undying Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

name: Universal Solvent
oracle_text: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Universal Solvent: Destroy target permanent.
flavor_text:
"A few drops of this, and the trickiest problems simply melt away."
—Thamaz, Weldfast inventor

name: Valakut Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Valakut Invoker deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"As long as we have walked this world, we have known it as a harsh and unforgiving place."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Viscera Seer
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

name: Welding Sparks
oracle_text: Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.
flavor_text:
"The fires of invention burn in all of us. I fight for the freedom to unleash those flames."
—Pia Nalaar

name: Wickerbough Elder
oracle_text:
Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Living scarecrows make a mockery of the natural order. Dead ones make fine hats."

name: Wild Celebrants
oracle_text: When Wild Celebrants enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: "You can tell something's really valuable by the sound it makes when you slam your staff into it."

name: Wildheart Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Wildsize
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Two times the size, four times the smell.

name: Wind-Scarred Crag
oracle_text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

name: Woodland Stream
oracle_text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text: Waterways carve their routes through the land to reflect the paths the aether streams cut through the clouds.

name: Workshop Assistant
oracle_text: When Workshop Assistant dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Sometimes the smallest things make the biggest difference.

name: Yavimaya Elder
oracle_text:
When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.
